statements: DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'car' AND traffic_volume < 1000;
DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 60 AND road_section_id = 3;
DELETE FROM road_infrastructure WHERE road_id = 101 AND road_type = 'Highway';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE time < '2022-01-01' AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
DELETE FROM RoadSegments WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND traffic_flow < 50;
DELETE FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE road_id = 3 AND incident_type = 'Accident';
